FuncDef: The reset fwm smart-link command clears statistics. The reset fwm smart-link command clears statistics. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a port name.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a port type.
The value is an integer.

Specifies the index of a port.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
